summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Specifies whether the input audio stream is stereo or dual mono. This enumeration is used with the AVDecAudioDualMono property.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMono.eAVDecAudioDualMono_IsNotDualMono
member.summary: The input bit stream is not dual mono.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMono.eAVDecAudioDualMono_IsDualMono
member.summary: The input bit stream is dual mono.

member.name: eAVDecAudioDualMono.eAVDecAudioDualMono_UnSpecified
member.summary: There is no indication in the bit stream whether the audio is dual mono.
